title: Generalized Spectral Kurtosis toolkit
description: A modular, open-source Python toolkit for computing and visualizing the Generalized Spectral Kurtosis (SK) estimator. Built upon the theoretical framework introduced in Nita & Gary (2010, PASP 122, 595) and the renormalization logic from Nita & Hellbourg (2020, IEEE RFI2020), pyGSK provides thresholding, cross-correlation diagnostics, and pedagogical plotting for signal detection in spectral data.
